caseTitle: Tariq Ali Shah v. The State, etc
authorJudge: MR. JUSTICE QAZI MUHAMMAD AMIN AHMED
tagline: Witnesses do not appear to have come forward with the whole truth and given the formidable past hounding both sides, patent discrepancies cannot be viewed as trivial, particularly after prosecution's failure qua three of the co-accused albeit with somewhat different roles. It would be unsafe to maintain the conviction.
